name: arbitrariness
content:
arbitrariness noun [U]
(CHANCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being based on chance rather than being planned or based on reason: The story is a lesson on the arbitrariness of fate. There is nothing we can do about the arbitrariness of illness.
More examplesFewer examplesThe arbitrariness of US state-by-state minimum wage laws is bewildering. As an actor she's become reconciled to the arbitrariness of film and TV casting.There was arbitrariness in the way applications were processed.
